name: Lea Valley Walk (link to Luton Parkway station)

ai.summary: Lea Valley Walk near Luton Parkway Station offers a very short, easy 0.3 km riverside stroll in the UK. The segment is in an unknown region and follows a flat, urban path along the Lea Valley, suitable for families, beginners, or a quick leg stretch.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, urban path along the river. Mostly paved or compact gravel with minimal elevation change; occasional grassy edges.
ai.safety_notes: Treat this as a short urban walk. Stay aware of pedestrians and cyclists on shared paths; be cautious at road crossings near the station; UK weather can change quickly—bring a light layer and rain protection; keep valuables secure and carry a charged phone for maps and emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; spring and autumn often provide the best weather and scenery, while summer offers longer daylight, and winter requires extra care in wet conditions.
